ing: 4 strips cooked bacon, cut in half
8 teaspoons crumbled blue cheese, or more to taste
des: "This quick and easy appetizer is and a great way to impress your guests! Perfect for picnics, too."
ins: Thread each lettuce wedge, bacon piece, and grape tomato onto each toothpick, respectively. Arrange toothpicks on a serving platter. Drizzle 1 teaspoon blue cheese dressing over each and sprinkle with blue cheese.
